name: Inquisition (itch)
description:
Inquisition is a 2d stealth platformer made in UPC gamelab.

In this game you must save your wife from the Holy Inquisition, but you are just one man, can you fight with a whole organization?

Play smart and careful to not suffer.

This game was made by:

Lead Programmer, Producer and Co-Game Designer:

Aldhair Vera (me :v) (https://goo.gl/KGVXgD)

Enemy IA programmer:

Renato Castillo (https://goo.gl/m813fP)

Co-Game Designer and Programmer:

Anthony Uribe (https://goo.gl/ZGa7Di)

Amazing Artist and Co-Game Designer:

Sofia Ismodes (https://o-alexr-o.deviantart.com/)

Damn good Musician:

Diego Villafuerte (https://goo.gl/Sm5aDb)

The fallen programmer:

Jason Almandroz

Can hear the soundtracks here: https://soundcloud.com/diegovillafuerte/sets/inquisition
